item.title: Flight Crew Communication Equipment – Boom Microphones

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided:

numlitem.para: Associated hand microphone is installed and is operative,
Flight Data Recorder (FDR) is operative, and
Repairs are made within three flight days.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "Boom Microphone INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
